label: CropLayer

LocationSensitiveAttention
peekOfCode:
class LocationSensitiveAttention(tf.keras.layers.Layer):
    def __init__(self, units, filters=32, kernel_size=31, **kwargs):
        super(LocationSensitiveAttention, self).__init__(**kwargs)
        self.units = units
        self.filters = filters
        self.kernel_size = kernel_size
        self.W_query = layers.Dense(units)
        self.W_values = layers.Dense(units)
        self.W_location = layers.Dense(units)
        self.V = layers.Dense(1)

label: rag_chatbot
peekOfCode:
def rag_chatbot(query):
    retrieved_text = retrieve_response(query)
    prompt = (
        f"User asked: {query}\n\n"
        f"Relevant Info: {retrieved_text}\n\n"
        f"Answer: concisely based only on the relevant info above:"
    )
    print("\nðŸŸ¡ Prompt sent to LLaMA:\n", prompt)
    response = llm(f"[INST] {prompt} [/INST]", max_tokens=100, temperature=0.7)
    print("\nðŸ”µ LLaMA raw response:\n", response)

label: get_chat_response
peekOfCode:
def get_chat_response(prompt):
    return rag_chatbot(prompt)
